posts.title: adb 获取 Android 手机本信息
posts.text: 如何查看 android 手机 编译信息编译信息 存储在 /system/build.prop 文件中，但是这个文件查看权限需要 root 之后才能查看，但是知道 具体属性的名称则可以通过 adb 命令查看。 获取 build.prop 文件的内容 创建模拟器; adb shell 进入刚创建的模拟器，执行 su 切换到 root 权限下面； 打开 /system/build.prop下面 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091929394$ adb shellgeneric_x86_64:/ $ sugeneric_x86_64:/ # pwd/generic_x86_64:/ # cat /system/build.prop# begin common build properties# autogenerated by build/make/tools/buildinfo_common.shro.system.build.date=Fri Aug 2 05:01:12 UTC 2019ro.system.build.date.utc=1564722072ro.system.build.fingerprint=Android/sdk_phone_x86_64/generic_x86_64:10/QPP6.190730.005.B1/5775370:userdebug/test-keysro.system.build.id=QPP6.190730.005.B1ro.system.build.tags=test-keysro.system.build.type=userdebugro.system.build.version.incremental=5775370ro.system.build.version.release=10ro.system.build.version.sdk=29ro.product.system.brand=Androidro.product.system.device=generic_x86_64ro.product.system.manufacturer=unknownro.product.system.model=Android SDK built for x86_64ro.product.system.name=sdk_phone_x86_64# end common build properties# begin build properties# autogenerated by buildinfo.shro.build.id=QPP6.190730.005.B1ro.build.display.id=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebug 10 QPP6.190730.005.B1 5775370 test-keysro.build.version.incremental=5775370ro.build.version.sdk=29ro.build.version.preview_sdk=0ro.build.version.preview_sdk_fingerprint=RELro.build.version.codename=RELro.build.version.all_codenames=RELro.build.version.release=10ro.build.version.security_patch=2019-08-01ro.build.version.base_os=ro.build.version.min_supported_target_sdk=23ro.build.date=Fri Aug 2 05:01:12 UTC 2019ro.build.date.utc=1564722072ro.build.type=userdebugro.build.user=android-buildro.build.host=abfarm830ro.build.tags=test-keysro.build.flavor=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebugro.build.ab_update=false# ro.product.cpu.abi and ro.product.cpu.abi2 are obsolete,# use ro.product.cpu.abilist instead.ro.product.cpu.abi=x86_64ro.product.cpu.abilist=x86_64,x86ro.product.cpu.abilist32=x86ro.product.cpu.abilist64=x86_64ro.product.locale=en-USro.wifi.channels=# ro.build.product is obsolete; use ro.product.devicero.build.product=generic_x86_64# Do not try to parse description or thumbprintro.build.description=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebug 10 QPP6.190730.005.B1 5775370 test-keys# end build properties## from build/make/target/board/gsi_system.prop## GSI always generate dex pre-opt in system imagero.cp_system_other_odex=0# GSI always disables adb authenticationro.adb.secure=0# GSI disables non-AOSP nnapi extensions on product partitionro.nnapi.extensions.deny_on_product=true# TODO(b/120679683): disable RescueParty before all problem apps solvedpersist.sys.disable_rescue=true# TODO(b/78105955): disable privapp_permissions checking before the bug solvedro.control_privapp_permissions=disable# TODO(b/136212765): the default for LMKro.lmk.kill_heaviest_task=truero.lmk.kill_timeout_ms=100ro.lmk.use_minfree_levels=true# end of build/make/target/board/gsi_system.prop## ADDITIONAL_BUILD_PROPERTIES#ro.bionic.ld.warning=1ro.treble.enabled=truepersist.debug.dalvik.vm.core_platform_api_policy=just-warndalvik.vm.lockprof.threshold=500xmpp.auto-presence=truero.config.nocheckin=yesnet.bt.name=Androidgeneric_x86_64:/ # adb 获取具体属性内容注：连接多个设备的时候，需要指定具体设备，-s 设备 ID查看 android sdk 版本号 12$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.version.sdk24 查看 android 系统版本号 12$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.version.release7.0 查看编译日期 1234$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.dateWed Aug 1 11:13:51 KST 2018$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.date.utc1533089631 查看 支持的 CPU 类型 12$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.product.cpu.abilistarm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a,armeabi 查看 fingerprint 12adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.fingerprintsamsung/nobleltezc/nobleltechn:7.0/NRD90M/N9200ZCS3DRH1:user/release-keys 获取 全部属性查看全部属性 adb shell getprop

posts.title: Hexo GitHub Page 上传图片
posts.text: 图片需要在文章和首页中 同时出现 上传本地图片使用相对路径需要 配置 /_config.ymlpost_asset_folder: true然后 执行命令 hexo n post_name会在 source/_posts 下面 出现一个 post_name 文件夹和 post_name.md 的文件将图片存放在 post_name 文件夹 下面即可 使用 1![](big_image.jpg) 使用绝对路径12图片存储位置/source/_posts/Hexo-GitHub-Page-上传图片/big_image.jpg 使用 1![](/images/2020-03-29/big_image.jpg) 添加网络图片使用图床将图片上传至 图片服务器 七牛云、又拍云 、阿里云 或其他的，获取到图片下载链接 使用 1![](https://gb-imgs.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/big_image.jpg)

posts.title: react 入门
posts.text: 准备环境nodejs npm react 脚手架npm i create-react-app -g 创建 react 工程123mkdir react-app && cd react-appcreate-react-app .yarn start

posts.title: Hexo Github Pages 搭建 Blog
posts.text: 安装工具 install nodejs brew install node install hexo npm i hexo -g 查看 hexo 版本12345678910111213141516171819202122 mz@Mz  ~  node --versionv13.11.0 mz@Mz  ~  npm --version6.14.4 mz@Mz  ~  hexo -verisonhexo-cli: 3.1.0os: Darwin 19.3.0 darwin x64node: 13.11.0v8: 7.9.317.25-node.29uv: 1.34.2zlib: 1.2.11brotli: 1.0.7ares: 1.15.0modules: 79nghttp2: 1.40.0napi: 6llhttp: 2.0.4openssl: 1.1.1dcldr: 35.1icu: 64.2tz: 2019aunicode: 12.1 常用命令 hexo clean hexo g hexo s hexo d 本地调试 hexo g #生成 hexo s #启动本地服务，进行文章预览调试 hexo d -g #或者直接作用组合命令

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
